TopicTitle: "Eve: Order Zero" -- a KSP Graphic Novel (POSTLUDE COMPLETE...bet you didn't see THAT coming.)

Articles.Content:
> 
> Thanks again for allowing me to use the first page of your graphic novels! Here's what it looks like inside the cab:

Brilliant! Very much honored, thank you!

> 
> Thanks again for allowing me to use the first page of your graphic novels! Here's what it looks like inside the cab:
> [http://i.imgur.com/QwpcPu4.png](http://i.imgur.com/QwpcPu4.png)
> 
> I don't yet know how to make the screen clickable, but once I do, it will fire up a browser and go to the first page on this thread. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Hmm...do you think you have enough things? And i have a feeling there is not enough stuff. Needs moar ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ANd seriously now - it looks really sweet. Will download when ready ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Hmm...do you think you have enough things? And i have a feeling there is not enough stuff. Needs moar ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ANd seriously now - it looks really sweet. Will download when ready ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Heh. If you check my sig you'll see a link to the release thread. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Kenlie reminds me of somebody who feels under appreciated and needs a fantasy life, through his story, to get an outlet for his needs. He might want to change the names of the characters to protect the innocent though... heh!
**Will the Dres/Jool missions run at the same time or be more offset like DoB and EoZ?**

> 
> Hey, you have to be at least a little weird to want to write *good* fiction.

That's true.

Kenlie is actually quite cool...

> 
> Thanks again for allowing me to use the first page of your graphic novels! Here's what it looks like inside the cab:
> [http://i.imgur.com/QwpcPu4.png](http://i.imgur.com/QwpcPu4.png)
> 
> I don't yet know how to make the screen clickable, but once I do, it will fire up a browser and go to the first page on this thread. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You must love Stuff And Things!![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

What size is that thing? Mk3?

Or a custom size? Like the K&K base systems?

"Awwwww" at Kenlie's fanfiction. Now all that needs to happen is for *Martystu* Kerman to write some smut, and then the whole forum thread will collapse! No but really, the stories that Kenlie writes are a neat touch. I wonder if this will enter the plot at some point.

Kenlie: Now I'll just send it to my Mommy, so she can see how good of a writer I am!

\*SEND TO ALL\*

Kenlie:

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wRnSnfiUI54?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

After finding that link above, I just got the reference in that dream on Moho. Really should have gotten that already.
@Thegamer211: I sent you a PM so I don't derail the story. Looking forward to reading more. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Just one more today; reason for the slower than usual pace is that there are a LOT of flights going on behind the scenes. 

> 
> In addition to Kenlie's Gliido I've had to land the Munshuttle at the Munbase, send some ore piggies around Minmus to transfer fuel and ore, and manage *Alouette*'s multiple trips from Gilly to *Evestation*. It sounds like a lot of work but really other than writing comics this is what makes me happiest in KSP--having a fully developed "model railroad" to play with.

 I guess the consolation is that thanks to Kenlie, every update gives you two stories for the price of one...

![Gr4djib.png](http://i.imgur.com/Gr4djib.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-22T20:09:50Z" title="09/22/2015 08:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 22, 2015</time> by Kuzzter**
Kenlie is going to get marooned in space permanently if he keeps this up. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
Kenlie is so very distracted, lol.

> 
> **Will the Dres/Jool missions run at the same time or be more offset like DoB and EoZ?**

Dres mission? What Dres mission? And what's Dres, anyway, I never heard of it. Is it in a mod or something?

> 
> After finding that link above, I just got the reference in that dream on Moho. Really should have gotten that already.

I think it was the last *Wrath of Khan* reference the readers demanded, unless I need someone to demonstrate "two-dimensional thinking" later on. 

> 
> Kenlie is so very distracted, lol.

And the meta-meta-fiception part? At least half of us reading/writing this stuff are supposed to be working and/or studying right now...

> 
> And the meta-meta-fiception part? At least half of us reading/writing this stuff are supposed to be working and/or studying right now...

Hilarious!

And deeply true.

Happy landings!

> 
> And the meta-meta-fiception part? At least half of us reading/writing this stuff are supposed to be working and/or studying right now...

Now I want to see Kenlie have Martystu write a fanfiction...
I'm laughing out loud at Kenlie's fanfic. I dare to say, Kuzzter, his fanfic is everything that yours isn't! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Please PLEASE have Kenlie on the Jool mission...

(Also, a Dres mission WOULD be nice, maybe have it as a sort of side-story in the next comic, or maybe in this one! Dres is cool, and very underrated, a mission there would be unique!)

> 
> Now I want to see Kenlie have Martystu write a fanfiction...

Martystu doesn't write fanfic. Martystu only writes bestsellers.

Good thing Kenlie doesn't have an fanfiction..net account ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) He would be mercilessly bashed in comments about excessive MartyStu-ishness of his writing ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Just finished catching up with this! It appears that the moral of the story is never to put a writer in charge of an experimental spaceplane. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Great work, Kuzzter - really looking forward to the rest of the story!

> 
> Dres mission? What Dres mission? And what's Dres, anyway, I never heard of it. Is it in a mod or something?
> I think it was the last *Wrath of Khan* reference the readers demanded, unless I need someone to demonstrate "two-dimensional thinking" later on. 
> 
> And the meta-meta-fiception part? At least half of us reading/writing this stuff are supposed to be working and/or studying right now...

"Huh, Jebediah, look. 'Comder' Kenlie is trying to ram us."

"What? Get out of the way!"

The ship blasted right past.

"This is Kaptin Valentina Kerman to KSC, Kenlie's gone rogue! KSC?"

Bill realized something.

"Val, wait. Look at Kenlie's manuevers. He's demonstrating two-dimensional thinking!"

Val had a lightbulb pop up in her head. She pointed the ship normal, and did a 10 second burn. Kenlie became surprised, not sure what to do. A half orbit later, Kenlie's ship approached again.

"RAM HIM WITH THE PROBES!" Jeb screamed.

> 
> Please PLEASE have Kenlie on the Jool mission...

Assuming everyone comes back from Eve all right, we'll have four aircraft/boat pilots available: (Jeb, Gregmore, Tedus, and Kenlie). We'll have to see how many billets are available, and how many characters I think I'll be able to handle effectively in the story.

> 
> Just finished catching up with this! It appears that the moral of the story is never to put a writer in charge of an experimental spaceplane!

You can't always tell who the writers are until it's too late... just ask my boss. Or my wife.

> 
> "Val, wait. Look at Kenlie's manuevers. He's demonstrating two-dimensional thinking!"

Heh. They could totally get Kenlie to charge into the Kutari Nebula after them by insulting his writing: "Kenlie... I'm *laughing* at the inferior fanfic."
One of these days I'll need to sit down and give this whole story a good read. Still, I like what I've seen so far. Keep up the good work!
I will admit I did get a bit disappointed after I saw the 'ship'ing part and then read the page. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)

> 
> I will admit I did get a bit disappointed after I saw the 'ship'ing part and then read the page. ![:blush:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_embarrassed.gif)
